Cool stuff :)
Would it be a major problem in the demo application to have the interactions not mirror-inverted? Currently, it is very cumbersome to interact.

Hi Christian,

Thanks for the question. If you click the Camera Tab and then click Adjust Camera Properties - you can select to mirror the image. There are other camera settings there as well.

Cheers
Nicole
